## HTTP 集邮册

看 MDN 找各种 status code 的触发条件，以及特殊 client header 服务器要怎么处理。

### 100

```
GET / HTTP/1.1\r\n
Host: example.com\r\n
Expect: 100-continue\r\n\r\n
```

### 200

```
GET / HTTP/1.1\r\n
Host: example.com\r\n\r\n
```

### 206

```
GET / HTTP/1.1\r\n
Host: example.com\r\n
Range: bytes=0-1023\r\n\r\n
```

### 304

```
GET / HTTP/1.1\r\n
Host: example.com\r\n
If-Modified-Since: Tue, 15 Aug 2023 17:03:04 GMT\r\n\r\n
```

### 400

```
GET / HTTP/0.1\r\n
Host: example.com\r\n\r\n
```

### 404

```
GET /404 HTTP/1.1\r\n
Host: example.com\r\n\r\n
```

### 405

```
PUT / HTTP/1.1\r\n
Host: example.com\r\n\r\n
```

### 412

```
GET / HTTP/1.1\r\n
Host: example.com\r\n
If-Match: fa\r\n\r\n
```

### 414

```
GET \r\n
Host: example.com\r\n\r\n
```

### 416

```
GET / HTTP/1.1\r\n
Host: example.com\r\n
Range: bytes=2-1\r\n\r\n
```

### 501

```
GET / HTTP/1.1\r\n
Host: example.com\r\n
Transfer-Encoding: gzip, chunked\r\n\r\n
```

### 505

```
GET / HTTP/4.1\r\n
Host: example.com\r\n\r\n
```

### No Status (HTTP 0.9)

```
GET /\r\n\r\n
```
